snippet: The measure to raise the hourly rate by $1 passed easily on Tuesday, by a margin of 60 percent to 40 percent, pleasing labor leaders and dismaying the business community.
abstract: The measure to raise the hourly rate by $1 passed easily on Tuesday, by a margin of 60 percent to 40 percent, pleasing labor leaders and dismaying the business community.

headline.main: New Jersey: Voters Pass a Higher Minimum Wage
